scenes.description: Devil Kronii performs the song "蒼天に燃ゆ".
Devil Kronii and Angel Kronii talk after the song performance.
Devil Kronii announces and describes her 2024 birthday merchandise.
Devil Kronii interacts with Angel Kronii, leading into the next segment.
